title: How to Make Bumble Bees

steps.headline: Chop up the dates, nuts, raisins and ginger into small pieces.
Add the sultanas and coconut.
steps.description: Pour in the condensed milk and mix all together well.

steps.headline: Once mixed, mould each "bumble bee shape" using a teaspoon to create a long, ball-like shape that could pass for a bee's body.
steps.description: Roll in the coconut. Place a piece of cherry on top.

steps.headline: Place each bumble bee on a tray lined with baking paper.
Place in the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and allow to cool on a wire cooling rack.

text: Chop up the dates, nuts, raisins and ginger into small pieces. Put into a mixing bowl. Add the sultanas and coconut. Pour in the condensed milk and mix all together well. Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Once mixed, mould each "bumble bee shape" using a teaspoon to create a long, ball-like shape that could pass for a bee's body. Roll in the coconut. Place a piece of cherry on top. Place each bumble bee on a tray lined with baking paper.  Place in the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes.  Remove from the oven and allow to cool on a wire cooling rack.
